tool_description: Analyzes content rights availability across specified territories, identifying existing licenses, restrictions, and available windows for new deals.

content_id.description: Unique identifier for the content being analyzed

territory_codes.description: ISO country codes for territories to analyze

media_type.description: Type of media: film, tv_series, documentary, animation

analysis_date.description: Date for rights analysis (default: current date)

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Content identifier not found in database. Verify the content_id exists.
Unsupported territory code: One or more territory codes are invalid. Use valid ISO country codes.
Invalid media type: Use one of [film, tv_series, documentary, animation].
Future analysis date: analysis_date cannot be in the future. Use current date or past dates only.
usage: Provide content_id, territory_codes array, and media_type. Optionally specify analysis_date for historical analysis. Returns detailed rights status for each territory.

territory_status.description: Rights status for each requested territory

restricted_territories.description: Territories with existing restrictions or licenses
